name: Anti-Rythmic SAT
description: Entry by Tumbling, 180° in the first rotation for maximum points + 1 SAT rotation at the end

criterias.normal: rhythm and regularity of the decreasing angle of the axis, flow, exit or connection
criterias.twisted: from Cab Slide: twist during the Infinite turns, must stay twisted until the SAT. Must stay twisted for 1 SAT rotation, can untwist for the exit. From Tumbling: twisted on the entry, must stay twisted until the SAT. Must stay twisted for 1 SAT turn, can untwist for the exit
criterias.hardcore entry: twisted on the speed taking, getting untwisted and twisted in the other direction while pulling the entry
